name: Unsightly
description:
In this horror game you don't want to meet yourself.

move: WASD

On the right side of the screen you can see the map. There you can see your location.

On the left side instead...

Programmers : Minjutin & BlockyBear

Art and 3d-models : Max1m1l1an

A game made for Finnish Game Jam 2022
